mapper.select: SELECT * FROM house_info WHERE house_seq NOT IN (SELECT reservation_house_seq FROM reservation WHERE reservation_check_out>=sysdate) AND house_location=#{location} AND house_status=0

SELECT NVL(MIN(house_price_default),0) AS minp, NVL(MAX(house_price_default),9999999) AS maxp FROM house_info WHERE house_seq NOT IN (SELECT reservation_house_seq FROM reservation WHERE reservation_check_out>=sysdate) AND house_location=#{location} AND house_status=0
SELECT * FROM house_info WHERE house_seq NOT IN (SELECT reservation_house_seq FROM reservation WHERE reservation_check_out>=sysdate) AND house_status=0

SELECT NVL(MIN(house_price_default),0) AS minp, NVL(MAX(house_price_default),9999999) AS maxp FROM house_info WHERE house_seq NOT IN (SELECT reservation_house_seq FROM reservation WHERE reservation_check_out>=sysdate) AND house_status=0
SELECT * FROM house_info WHERE house_seq NOT IN (SELECT reservation_house_seq FROM reservation WHERE reservation_check_out>=sysdate) AND house_location=#{location} AND house_status=0

SELECT NVL(MIN(house_price_default),0) AS minp, NVL(MAX(house_price_default),9999999) AS maxp FROM house_info WHERE house_seq NOT IN (SELECT reservation_house_seq FROM reservation WHERE reservation_check_out>=sysdate) AND house_location=#{location} AND house_status=0

SELECT * FROM house_info WHERE house_seq NOT IN (SELECT reservation_house_seq FROM reservation WHERE (reservation_check_in between #{checkIn} AND #{checkOut}) OR (reservation_check_out between #{checkIn} AND #{checkOut})) AND house_location=#{location} AND house_status=0

SELECT NVL(MIN(house_price_default),0) AS minp, NVL(MAX(house_price_default),9999999) AS maxp FROM house_info WHERE house_seq NOT IN (SELECT reservation_house_seq FROM reservation WHERE (reservation_check_in between #{checkIn} AND #{checkOut}) OR (reservation_check_out between #{checkIn} AND #{checkOut})) AND house_location=#{location} AND house_status=0

SELECT * FROM house_info WHERE house_seq NOT IN (SELECT reservation_house_seq FROM reservation WHERE (reservation_check_in between #{checkIn} AND #{checkOut}) OR (reservation_check_out between #{checkIn} AND #{checkOut})) AND house_location=#{location} AND house_status=0 AND house_location_gugun=#{detail}

SELECT NVL(MIN(house_price_default),0) AS minp, NVL(MAX(house_price_default),9999999) AS maxp FROM house_info WHERE house_seq NOT IN (SELECT reservation_house_seq FROM reservation WHERE (reservation_check_in between #{checkIn} AND #{checkOut}) OR (reservation_check_out between #{checkIn} AND #{checkOut})) AND house_location=#{location} AND house_status=0 AND house_location_gugun=#{detail}
SELECT * FROM house_info WHERE house_seq NOT IN (SELECT reservation_house_seq FROM reservation WHERE reservation_check_out>=sysdate) AND house_status=0

SELECT NVL(MIN(house_price_default),0) AS minp, NVL(MAX(house_price_default),9999999) AS maxp FROM house_info WHERE house_seq NOT IN (SELECT reservation_house_seq FROM reservation WHERE reservation_check_out>=sysdate) AND house_status=0
SELECT * FROM house_info WHERE house_seq NOT IN (SELECT reservation_house_seq FROM reservation WHERE reservation_regdate+30>=sysdate) AND house_seq NOT IN (SELECT popular_house_seq FROM popular)
